name: search_sources
description: Search for information within a specific source document. Use this to find relevant content from uploaded documents, transcripts, or other sources. Returns chunks of text with chunk_ids that you can cite in your response using [[cite:chunk_id]] format.

source_id.description: The ID of the source document to search within. Get this from the available sources list.

keywords.description: Optional list of 1-2 word keywords for text matching search. Good for finding specific terms or names.

query.description: Optional semantic search query describing what you're looking for. Good for conceptual searches.
